plot: The 29-year-old has broken nearly every bone in his body on his death-defying path to motorcross glory. Now, Travis is up against the biggest challenge of his professional career: to become a top competitor in NASCAR racing.
plot_en: The 29-year-old has broken nearly every bone in his body on his death-defying path to motorcross glory. Now, Travis is up against the biggest challenge of his professional career: to become a top competitor in NASCAR racing.
plot_es: The 29-year-old has broken nearly every bone in his body on his death-defying path to motorcross glory. Now, Travis is up against the biggest challenge of his professional career: to become a top competitor in NASCAR racing.
title: On Pace with Pastrana
